name: Platform Peril
description:
This game is a survival runner where the only objective is to survive as long as you can. Avoid spikes and grab the power-up for some assistance, but beware as you could accidentaly get an ability which isn't as ideal from it. It took me 3 days to make and is my first game so enjoy! Use A and D to move left and right, and use space to jump. Esc opens the pause screen. Try and get the highest score you can! Good luck.

Assets from the "Free 2D Mega Pack by Brackleys on the Unity asset store.
